title: The magic school bus explores the solar system (PC)
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Science - Study and teaching
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Multimedia systems
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
Mathematics, Science & Technology/Science - Study and teaching
description: Take an interplanetary adventure as the Magic School Bus blasts off into the solar system. Ms Frizzle gets lost in space! It's your mission to collect clues, discover the secrets of the solar system, and find the friz to win the game. SYSTEMS REQUIREMENTS: A multimedia PC or compatible with 486SX or higher microprocessor, 25MHz, 4MB of RAM, at least 5MB of available hard disk space, double speed CDROM drive, 8-bit audio board, and SVGA display capable of 256 colours. MS-DOS version 5.1 ot later, Microsoft Windows, version 3.1 or later.
